translation.ja: 馬だわ

translation.en: -I'm sorry? -He loves horses.
translation.ja: 何の話？ 兄は馬が好き

translation.en: He works every day before school at Will Rogers Park.
translation.ja: 毎日 登校前に馬の世話をしてる

translation.en: So like a cowboy, huh?
translation.ja: カウボーイね

translation.en: No, more like a horse girl.
translation.ja: ホースガールかな

translation.en: He kind of cried when he found out unicorns weren't real.
translation.ja: ユニコーンが幻と知って泣いてた

translation.en: Cameron. What a weird coincidence.
translation.ja: キャメロン　奇妙な偶然ね

translation.en: Uh, well, I'm here every morning, so… I'm pretty sure the only weird part is you.
translation.ja: 俺は毎朝来てるから奇妙なのは 君だけだ

translation.en: Fair enough.
translation.ja: なるほど

translation.en: I was hoping to take a riding lesson this morning.
translation.ja: 乗馬レッスンを受けたいの

translation.en: And I figured since you and I are friends--
translation.ja: あなたとは友達だから…

translation.en: -Ah, friends? -In the sense we go to school together.
translation.ja: 友達？ 同じ学校に通ってる

translation.en: Kind of a loose definition. Don't you think?
translation.ja: 強引な定義だな

translation.en: Uh, look, I have a lot of work to get done before school--
translation.ja: 学校までに仕事を終えないと…

translation.en: So let me help! Then if there's time afterwards,
translation.ja: 手伝わせて そのあとで時間があればレッスンを

translation.en: we can squeeze in a lesson.
translation.ja: そのあとで時間があればレッスンを

translation.en: -You don't even know what the job is. -That's okay. I am at your service.
translation.ja: 仕事も知らず？ 構わない　喜んで手伝うわ

translation.en: Ugh! There's just so much of it. [gags]
translation.ja: すごい量ね

translation.en: What do horses eat anyway?
translation.ja: 何 食べてるの？

translation.en: [Cameron] Well, that one, Jimbo over there, he likes Chipotle.
translation.ja: ジンボはメキシコ料理が好きで

translation.en: Gilly prefers sushi.
translation.ja: ギリーの好物は寿司

translation.en: Just horse feed. Hay, grass mostly.
translation.ja: 馬糧だ　ほとんどが草

translation.en: Well, this one must have eaten an entire soccer field.
translation.ja: この馬はサッカー場の草 全部ね

translation.en: Well, you offered to help. I'm starting to think you've never shoveled crap before.
translation.ja: 手伝うのはいいけど糞(ふん)を片づけたことないだろ

translation.en: Only out of a litter box.
translation.ja: 猫の糞ならある

translation.en: And this dump is bigger than my cat.
translation.ja: これ 私の猫より大きい

translation.en: So, you really come here every day before school?
translation.ja: 毎朝 登校前に来てるの？

translation.en: Yep, ever since I was 14.
translation.ja: ああ　14歳の時からね

translation.en: Wow, you really want to chronicle your post-poop clean-up look?
translation.ja: 馬の糞を片づけたあとの写真なんて要る？

translation.en: I chronicle everything. That's my job.
translation.ja: 何でも撮るわそれが私の仕事

translation.en: So, how about that lesson now?
translation.ja: それで レッスンは？

translation.en: I guess a deal's a deal.
translation.ja: 約束は約束だしな

translation.en: So, do you have any previous riding experience?
translation.ja: これまで乗馬の経験はある？

translation.en: Just one time at a birthday party when I was five,
translation.ja: 一度ね　５歳の誕生日会よ

translation.en: but I think it was a baby horse,
translation.ja: 子馬だったと思う

translation.en: or maybe not baby, but it was small. [chuckles nervously] Does that count?
translation.ja: 分からないけど小さかった乗馬の経験に入る？

translation.en: I believe the word you're looking for is pony and no.
translation.ja: “ポニー”のことだよね経験には入らない

translation.en: [inhales] Anyway, this is Gilly. He can be a little temperamental, so I--
translation.ja: コイツはギリーだ 少し短気だから…

translation.en: -What are you doing? -I'm letting him smell my hand.
translation.ja: 何してる？ 手のにおいを嗅がせてる馬の握手よ

translation.en: It's like a handshake for horses. I did my research last night. [chuckles]
translation.ja: 手のにおいを嗅がせてる馬の握手よ 昨夜 調べたの

translation.en: -[soft neighing] -Whoa. Why is he doing that?
translation.ja: あら 何してるの？

translation.en: Actually means he likes you.
translation.ja: 君が好きみたいだ

translation.en: Oh, well, I guess he has good instincts.
translation.ja: 人を見抜く力があるのね

translation.en: Right.
translation.ja: そうだな

translation.en: Let's, um, try mounting up. So come over here.
translation.ja: 乗ってみよう　こっちに来て

translation.en: Put your left foot in the stirrup, grab the reins with your left hand,
translation.ja: 左足はここ手綱は左手で握って

translation.en: and use your other leg to haul you up and over.
translation.ja: 右脚を使って上にまたがる

translation.en: -I'm a natural, right? -Not bad.
translation.ja: できた 悪くない

translation.en: [Cameron] Um, seriously?
translation.ja: マジ？

translation.en: -More? -I'm just capturing the moment. [chuckles]
translation.ja: まだ撮る？ この瞬間を残すの

translation.en: You can't enjoy this without sharing it with 500 strangers?
translation.ja: 500人の他人と共有する必要が？

translation.en: Five hundred? Try 887,132.
And they're not strangers. They're followers.
translation.ja: それに他人じゃなくフォロワー

translation.en: Followers? You mean like a cult?
translation.ja: カルトみたいだな

translation.en: No, not like a cult.
translation.ja: カルトじゃないわ

translation.en: Just people devoted to me and totally guided by my advice as to how to live their lives.
translation.ja: 私の助言に導かれて人生を送ってる

translation.en: I'm joking. I was just taking a picture.
translation.ja: 冗談よ　写真を撮ってただけ

translation.en: -You take pictures. What's the difference? -Too vast to even explain.
translation.ja: あなたの写真と同じ 大違いだ

translation.en: Now, come on off the horse.
translation.ja: さあ 下りて

translation.en: -That's it? We're done? -No.
translation.ja: もう終わり？

translation.en: I just want you to practice getting on and off.
translation.ja: 違う　乗馬と下馬の練習だ

translation.en: Oh, uh, okay.
translation.ja: 分かったわ

translation.en: -Whoa! -Whoa. Hold on. Hold on.
translation.ja: 危ない

translation.en: -Disgusting! -[laughs hysterically] Sorry!
translation.ja: 汚い！ 笑ってごめん

translation.en: Sorry for laughing. It's just I've never seen such an uncoordinated dismount.
translation.ja: あんな ぎこちない下馬は初めて見た

translation.en: I mean, aren't you captain of the dance team--
translation.ja: ダンスチームのリーダーじゃ…

translation.en: What? It's mostly grass, right?
translation.ja: 何よ？“ほとんどが草”でしょ？

translation.en: [Bosch] Attention Earthquakes, a reminder to buy your prom tickets,
translation.ja: プロムのチケット購入を忘れずに

translation.en: where the dance team will be performing their annual dance presentation.
translation.ja: 恒例のダンスチームの演技もあります

translation.en: A tradition I still don't understand, but it's the committee's decision, and I support them.
translation.ja: この伝統は理解不能ですが委員会の決定です

translation.en: …instead of starting in Portugal, we start in Amsterdam.
translation.ja: アムステルダムがいい

translation.en: Uh, Kweller, can we maybe do this later? I have a French quiz.
translation.ja: あとでいい？フランス語の試験がある

translation.en: These are the best fares I've seen in months. Just, um, give me your phone.
translation.ja: 今ならチケットが安いんだ携帯貸して

translation.en: -What's wrong with yours? -Really?
translation.ja: 自分のは？ マジ？

translation.en: Your aversion to technology is becoming a character flaw.
translation.ja: テクノロジー嫌いも大概にして

translation.en: Hey, guys.
translation.ja: ハーイ

translation.en: Uh… hey?
translation.ja: ハーイ？

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you for this morning.
translation.ja: 今朝はありがとう

translation.en: My butt is so sore. I could barely walk.
translation.ja: お尻が痛くて歩くのがやっとだった

translation.en: Things got messy.
translation.ja: いろいろあって

translation.en: Uh, context, please?
translation.ja: 説明してよ

translation.en: -I gave her a riding lesson. -I bet you did.
translation.ja: 乗り方を教えた なるほど

translation.en: Horse riding.
translation.ja: 馬の乗り方だ

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Part of one, anyway. And as a way of saying thanks, there is a karaoke party this Saturday
translation.ja: とにかく 今週土曜日にカラオケパーティーがあるの

translation.en: at my friend Quinn's house, and I was hoping you guys could come.
translation.ja: 友達のクインの家でねあなたたちも来て

translation.en: -Uh, yeah. Um, I don't… I don't-- -We'll be there.
translation.ja: それは ちょっと… 行く

translation.en: Perfect. So Cameron, should I like, SMS you the address?
translation.ja: 完璧ね ＳＭＳで住所を送ったほうがいい？

translation.en: Kweller's phone is an antiquated piece of crap.
translation.ja: クウェラーの携帯は骨董(とう)品よ私に送って

translation.en: -Why don't you send it to me? -Awesome. Okay.
translation.ja: クウェラーの携帯は骨董(とう)品よ私に送って 分かった

translation.en: -Okay, I'll see you guys tomorrow. -[Nisha] Totally.
translation.ja: また明日 うん

translation.en: What the hell?
translation.ja: 今のは？

translation.en: You've been talking about wanting to go on all these exotic adventures.
translation.ja: 冒険の旅がしたいって言ってたよね

translation.en: Why don't you just think of this as an adventure close to home.
translation.ja: ご近所で冒険すると思えばいい

translation.en: Oh, wow. It's a pool party.
translation.ja: プールパーティーだったんだね

translation.en: -Why didn't you tell me? -'Cause nobody told me.
translation.ja: 先に言ってよ 知らなかった

translation.en: What are we even doing here?
translation.ja: バカげてる　帰ろう

translation.en: -You know. Come on. -Wh-- wh-- wh-- Whoa!
translation.ja: バカげてる　帰ろう ちょっと待って

translation.en: Eating free Pizza Hut is what we're doing.
translation.ja: ピザを無料で食べられる

translation.en: Besides, when do you get to make fun of these guys in their own natural habitat? [chuckles]
translation.ja: この人たちを見物してバカにして楽しもうよ

translation.en: -That's true. -I mean, exhibit A.
translation.ja: 悪くない 例えば 展示Ａ

translation.en: Now that is rough. [chuckles]
translation.ja: あれはヤバい

translation.en: Yeah, it sounds like they're constipated,
translation.ja: 便秘してるみたいだ

translation.en: but for some reason, they're happy about it.
translation.ja: なぜか楽しそうだけど

translation.en: -[Padgett] Great! You guys came. -Yes, we did.
translation.ja: 来てくれたのね ああ 来たよ

translation.en: Yeah. This is cool. You do this often?
translation.ja: いい感じだね　よくやるの？

translation.en: It's kind of a pre-prom thing, so we can work on our tans.
translation.ja: プロムに備えて日焼けするためよ

translation.en: But I'm going to college in New York, so won't be doing this next year.
translation.ja: ニューヨークの大学に行くから来年はない

translation.en: -Where you guys going? -Uh, yeah.
translation.ja: ２人は？ とりあえず大学には行かないかな

translation.en: I'm kind of opting out of that whole thing.
translation.ja: とりあえず大学には行かないかな

translation.en: Oh, like a gap year?
translation.ja: ギャップイヤー？

translation.en: Yes, exactly like a gap year, followed by another gap year, and then a gap life.
translation.ja: その翌年もギャップイヤーで最終的にギャップライフに

translation.en: -Kweller doesn't believe in college. -Really?
translation.ja: 大学を信じてない 本当？

translation.en: Well, I believe it exists. I just think it's a huge waste of time and money.
translation.ja: 存在は知ってるけど時間とカネの無駄だ

translation.en: So, any idea what you're gonna sing? Everybody's got their go-to karaoke song.
translation.ja: ところで 何を歌う？得意な曲があるでしょ？

translation.en: -Right? -No.
translation.ja: ないよ

translation.en: Lemme guess. You're gonna opt out of the whole singing thing too?
translation.ja: もしかして歌も歌わない派？

translation.en: Wow! Thank you, ladies.
translation.ja: ありがとう お二人さん

translation.en: I can't tell you how much I enjoyed that performance.
translation.ja: すごすぎて 言葉がでないよ

translation.en: Nobody can.
translation.ja: 皆もだろ

translation.en: -[scoffs] -[DJ] All right, who's up next?
translation.ja: さて 次は誰？

translation.en: Padge Sawyer!
translation.ja: パッジ･ソーヤーだ

translation.en: -Guess it's my turn. Wish me luck. -[crowd cheers]
translation.ja: 私の番よ　幸運を祈って

translation.en: [DJ] All right, nowhere to go but up from there.
translation.ja: さあ ステージへ

translation.en: -We gotta see this. -["Teenage Dream" playing]
translation.ja: これは見もの

translation.en: Wow. I don't even know why she bothers with college.
translation.ja: すごい 大学なんて行かずにラスベガスに行ったほうがいい

translation.en: She might as well just get her residency in Vegas, am I right?
translation.ja: 大学なんて行かずにラスベガスに行ったほうがいい

translation.en: Oh my God.
translation.ja: ウソでしょ

translation.en: What?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: You're enjoying this? You're enjoying her.
translation.ja: 彼女が歌う姿を見て楽しんでるでしょ

translation.en: What? No, I'm not. No, I'm not. I'm--
translation.ja: 何だって？　そんなことない

translation.en: -[girl] Oh my gosh, that's Jordan. -Are you serious?
translation.ja: ジョーダンよ 信じられない

translation.en: What? I invited him. I didn't think he'd show up with her.
translation.ja: 彼は招待したけど彼女と来るなんて

translation.en: [Cameron] What's going on?
translation.ja: 何なんだ？

translation.en: Jordan's her ex. He totally humiliated her in front of a zillion people.
translation.ja: ジョーダンは彼女の元カレ大勢の前で恥をかかされた

translation.en: Oh my gosh. She's dying up there.
translation.ja: ヤバいわね　ボロボロよ

translation.en: Wait. Kweller.
translation.ja: 待って

translation.en: I really don't think you should go! Kweller, this is a truly awful idea!
translation.ja: マズいって！ クウェラー やめなってば！

translation.en: All right, Kweller.
translation.ja: やるじゃん

translation.en: -That's the bet guy? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 賭けの男？

translation.en: Who is this dude?
translation.ja: あの男は？

translation.en: They're actually kinda good.
translation.ja: やるわね

translation.en: They got all that on camera.
translation.ja: みんな撮ってたよ

translation.en: -That was actually amazing. -Yeah. I know, right?
translation.ja: すごかった 本当に

translation.en: Thanks for having my ass. I mean, saving my back.
translation.ja: バックアップをありがとう

translation.en: Having my back.
translation.ja: 間違えた “サポート”ね

translation.en: And I'm pretty sure that is my cue to call for a car.
translation.ja: 帰ったほうがよさそう車を呼ぶわ

translation.en: No, um, uh, don't do that. We'll give you a ride.
translation.ja: 必要ないよ　俺たちが送る

translation.en: -We will? -Yeah. It's no problem at all.
translation.ja: マジ？ ああ 問題ないさ

translation.en: -Can I get some KFC to go? -Yeah, sure.
translation.ja: 持って帰っても？ ええ

translation.en: Awesome.
translation.ja: やった

translation.en: ♪ Little freaks in they jeeps don't play ♪
translation.ja: じゃあね

translation.en: You know, you should really rethink that whole no-singing policy.
translation.ja: 歌わないなんて絶対もったいないわ

translation.en: You have a really great voice.
translation.ja: ステキな歌声だった

translation.en: Cameron was in the Glee Club. What?
translation.ja: 合唱団だったしね

translation.en: -I didn't know it was a secret. -Glee Club? At Cali?
translation.ja: 何よ？　秘密だった？ 合唱団？ カリ高校で？

translation.en: -No, no. -I didn't think Cali had--
translation.ja: カリ高校で？ ワイオミング州にいた頃さ

translation.en: It was at my old school back in Wyoming.
translation.ja: ワイオミング州にいた頃さ

translation.en: It was either play football or cow tipping.
translation.ja: 選択肢はアメフトか牛を倒す遊び

translation.en: -Or Glee Club. Yeah. -Or Glee Club? [chuckles]
translation.ja: もしくは 合唱団ね

translation.en: I get it. Oh, this is me.
translation.ja: なるほど 私の家よ

translation.en: [Nisha] This is you? My cousin lives here.
translation.ja: ここ？ 私のいとこも住んでる名前は…

translation.en: -Her name's Kaia Mehan. She's a junior-- -We're new here.
translation.ja: 私のいとこも住んでる名前は… 〝パリセーズ･ロフツ〞 越してきたばかりなの

translation.en: So we haven't really met anyone yet, but, um, thanks for the ride.
translation.ja: 越してきたばかりなの 送ってくれて ありがとう

translation.en: And thanks for coming today.
translation.ja: パーティーにも来てくれて

translation.en: I hope it wasn't too, you know, weird.
translation.ja: 変な奴らって思われてなきゃいいけど

translation.en: That's okay. Weird's totally our thing.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　変なのは大歓迎

translation.en: -[chuckles] Okay, then. See you later. -See ya.
translation.ja: じゃあ またね ああ

translation.en: -Hey, Padge. -Yeah?
translation.ja: パッジ 何？

translation.en: I gotta say, even though you're incredibly hot, you're not the complete monster that I thought you'd be.
translation.ja: あなたって イケてるけど思ったほど悪い人じゃないね

translation.en: Uh, thanks?
translation.ja: どうも

translation.en: But Cameron is like a brother to me.
translation.ja: でも キャメロンはきょうだい同然なんだ

translation.en: So, I have to say, if you do anything to hurt him,
translation.ja: でも キャメロンはきょうだい同然なんだ 傷つけたりしたら―

translation.en: I'll put a croquembouche in your croquem-face. You feel me?
translation.ja: クロカンブッシュを顔にねじ込むよ

translation.en: Uh, okay.
translation.ja: 分かった

translation.en: Don't forget.
translation.ja: 約束！

translation.en: I really like her.
translation.ja: 彼女 気に入った

translation.en: [Brin] Oh, look who's up.
translation.ja: 起きたわね

translation.en: How was your Saturday?
translation.ja: 土曜の話を

translation.en: Uh, it was okay. Why?
translation.ja: まあまあだ　なんで？

translation.en: Do anything interesting?
translation.ja: 何か 楽しいことが？

translation.en: Not really.
translation.ja: あんまり

translation.en: Well, more than 2.6 million TikTok viewers beg to differ!
translation.ja: TikTokを見た260万人の意見とは違うわね

translation.en: -[coughs] Ugh! -Are you kidding me? Why didn't you tell me you had a date with Padgett Sawyer?
translation.ja: パジェット･ソーヤーとデートしたのに 私に秘密？

translation.en: Trust me. It wasn't a date. The whole thing was a freakish aberration.
translation.ja: デートじゃない マジで異常な体験だった

translation.en: Okay, a person who is way out of your league is spending time with you. -Take the win and claim it as a date. -[phone vibrates]
translation.ja: 兄貴には高嶺の花よデートってことにしとけば？

translation.en: And speak of the devil herself. [gasps]
translation.ja: 〝パジェット･ソーヤー〞 噂をすれば 彼女からだわ

translation.en: -Padgett, hey. -[Padgett] Brin.
translation.ja: パジェット

translation.en: Hi. Uh, sorry to bother you, but I think I left something in your brother's truck yesterday, and I don't have his number.
translation.ja: ブリン 昨日お兄さんの車に忘れ物をしたみたいなの

translation.en: Oh, yeah, no problem. Yo, we were just talking about you.
translation.ja: そうなのね今 兄とあなたの話をしてた

translation.en: He's standing right in front of me. Do you wanna talk to him?
translation.ja: 目の前にいるから話す？

translation.en: [Padgett] I was hoping I could swing by now.
translation.ja: 今から取りに行っても？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, sure. When do you wanna come?
translation.ja: 分かった　いつ頃来る？

translation.en: Oh, like now, now.
translation.ja: ホントに“今”ね

translation.en: Okay. Yeah, hold on.
translation.ja: ちょっと待ってて

translation.en: You might wanna change.
translation.ja: 着替えなよ

translation.en: -Jessica. Hi. -[Jessica] Hey, Padgett.
translation.ja: ジェシカ どうも パジェット

translation.en: Saw the duet. 2.6 million views!
translation.ja: デュエットで視聴数260万回あの彼は誰？

translation.en: Who's the new guy? A little scruffy but cute.
translation.ja: デュエットで視聴数260万回あの彼は誰？ ダサいけどキュートね

translation.en: Well, just wait until I'm done with his makeover.
translation.ja: メイクオーバー作戦進行中よ

translation.en: Ooh, go on.
translation.ja: 続けて

translation.en: I'm gonna make him more popular than Jordan Van Draanen.
translation.ja: 彼をジョーダンより人気者にする

translation.en: [Jessica] Really? Well, if you do that, then we're back in business.
translation.ja: それができればビジネス再開ね

translation.en: I'll believe it when I see it. Love ya.
translation.ja: 実現すれば信じる

translation.en: -[line disconnects] -Love ya!
translation.ja: 大好きよ 大好きよ

translation.en: Thanks again. These things are always slipping out of my bag.
translation.ja: ありがとういつも落ちちゃうの

translation.en: Yeah, it's no problem.
translation.ja: 問題ないよ

translation.en: Since I'm already here, I was wondering if--
translation.ja: せっかく来たんだし…

translation.en: -What's all this stuff? -Uh, it's from Dad. Just got here.
translation.ja: それは？ パパからよ　今届いた

translation.en: Uh, great.
translation.ja: そうか

translation.en: -Gifts? What's the occasion? -Nothing. It's stupid.
translation.ja: 何の贈り物？ 何でもないよ

translation.en: Our dad lives in Sweden, and once a year, he sends us these all-in-one presents.
translation.ja: スウェーデンから年に一度 送ってくるの

translation.ja: 兄貴のクローゼットの中で一番 正装っぽい服

translation.en: Dude, it's a disaster in there. Why are there so many Skittles on the floor?
translation.ja: クローゼット 汚すぎよなんで床にお菓子が？

translation.en: Because I spilled some Skittles. Look, if that's for prom, I--
translation.ja: こぼしたからだプロムのことなら…

translation.en: Look, I know what you're gonna say, okay, and… I get it.
translation.ja: 兄貴が言いたいことは分かってる

translation.en: Padgett screwed up. What she did was mean and selfish and wrong.
translation.ja: パジェットがしたことは自分勝手で最低よ

translation.en: Yes, exactly. So why are you here?
translation.ja: 分かってるならなぜ ここに？

translation.en: Because, Cam…
translation.ja: 私 兄貴が…

translation.en: I've… I've missed you.
translation.ja: 恋しい

translation.en: Brin, I'm right here.
translation.ja: ここにいる

translation.en: No, no. I mean, like…
translation.ja: そうじゃないの

translation.en: I miss the way you used to be, you know? Before…
translation.ja: 昔の兄貴が恋しい

translation.en: Before Mom.
translation.ja: ママが死ぬ前の

translation.en: [sniffs] Ever since you've been with Padgett, okay,
translation.ja: パジェットといる時の兄貴は―

translation.en: you've been back, and you've been smiling again, and you've been happy.
translation.ja: 昔みたいに笑って幸せそうだった

translation.en: And I just feel like… [sniffs] …for the first time since we moved here
translation.ja: ここに越してきてから初めて―

translation.en: that I have my brother back.
translation.ja: 兄貴が戻った気がしてたの

translation.en: And don't lose her, Cam.
translation.ja: 兄貴が戻った気がしてたの 彼女を失わないで

translation.en: We lost mom, and there's nothing we could have done about that,
translation.ja: ママを失った時は何もできなかった

translation.en: but now you have a choice, so just… just don't lose her, okay?
translation.ja: でも パジェットは違う失わないで

translation.en: There you are, thank God. We need you to start the dance.
translation.ja: やっと来たわねダンスが始まるわ

translation.en: -Big night, huh? -What do you want, Alden?
translation.ja: いよいよね 何の用？

translation.en: Nothing, I just noticed you didn't bring Cameron.
translation.ja: キャメロンと一緒じゃないのね

translation.en: -So-- -He's not coming. Okay?
translation.ja: 彼は来ないわ

translation.en: You win the bet.
translation.ja: あなたの勝ち

translation.en: And when are you gonna become a permanent loser?
translation.ja: 負け犬の烙印はいつ入れるの？

translation.en: I'll get it done as soon as I can. Happy?
translation.ja: すぐ入れるわ　満足？

translation.en: I'll be happy when I get my crown. And, oh, hope you like the new choreography me and Jordan came up with.
translation.ja: クイーンの座を得たらねダンスでも圧倒してあげるわ

translation.en: [Bosch] Cali High Earthquakes, it's time to report to the stage for your annual dance…
translation.ja: 毎年恒例のダンスが始まりますので…

translation.en: -Come on. This is it. Let's go. -[Alden] Jordan, it's time.
translation.ja: さあ 行こう 時間よ

translation.en: Come on, guys. If you put your TikToks down,
translation.ja: スマホはやめて

translation.en: you'll see some people dancing in real life. It's gonna be great.
translation.ja: 現実世界の生のダンスを楽しもう

translation.en: [sighs, speaking to self] We have some weird-ass traditions at this school.
translation.ja: この学校には変な伝統が多い

translation.en: Hey, excuse me. Sorry. Hi.
translation.ja: ちょっと 失礼

translation.en: We hired a DJ for this thing. They said he was over here somewhere.
translation.ja: ＤＪを見かけなかったかい？

translation.en: -Oh actually, that's… that's me. -You're the DJ?
translation.ja: 僕がＤＪだ 君が？

translation.en: Great. Um, where's your stuff?
translation.ja: そうか　機材は？

translation.en: -My stuff? -Yeah, your equipment.
translation.ja: 機材？

translation.en: Your… your turntables, your jog wheel, crossfader? Your… your Traktor scratch?
translation.ja: ああ ターンテーブルとかいろいろあるだろ

translation.en: Dude, I have no idea what any of that stuff is.
translation.ja: 悪いけどそんなの知らない

translation.en: Are you telling me we paid you $4,500 for your phone?
translation.ja: 4500ドルも報酬を払ったのにスマホだけ？

translation.en: Yeah. Kinda. [scoffs]
translation.ja: そういうこと

translation.en: You know that's more than I make in a month?
translation.ja: 私の月給以上だと知ってる？

translation.en: Well… I know that now.
translation.ja: そうなの？　今 知った

translation.en: Hey, so no sign of Cameron?
translation.ja: キャメロンは まだ？

translation.en: No, and if he doesn't get here soon, it's gonna be too late.
translation.ja: 間に合わなくなっちゃう

translation.en: It already is. Principal Bosch's about to announce the court.
translation.ja: もう発表が始まるわよ

translation.en: -You sure you still wanna do this? -Yes.
translation.ja: 本当にやるの？ ええ

translation.en: If I win, I need you to live stream on your phone, and then go on this app on my phone and press the red button.
translation.ja: もし私がクイーンになったら私とあなたの携帯を使って…

translation.en: -I mean, how can I do both? -Just give me the phone.
translation.ja: 同時は無理よ 貸して　手伝う

translation.en: [Bosch tapping mic] Hello, hi, hey. One, two, three, eyes to me.
translation.ja: 皆さん こちらに注目を

translation.en: Come on, bring it in. It's the big moment.
translation.ja: 待ちに待った瞬間だ

translation.en: I know this is live streaming, but if you put your phones down,
translation.ja: 携帯のライブ配信で見なくていい

translation.en: it's actually happening right here in front of you.
translation.ja: 君たちの目の前でやってる

translation.en: -[sparse laughter] -[Bosch] Um… Look, I know this means a lot to some of you, so let's get through it so we can be done.
translation.ja: 楽しみにしてる人もいるからさっさと始めて片づけよう

translation.en: All right, your 2021 Cali High Prom King is
translation.ja: 2021年度 カリ高校のプロムキングは…

translation.en: Jordan Van Draanen.
translation.ja: ジョーダン･ヴァン･ドラネン

translation.en: [Bosch] Congratulations to Jordan.
translation.ja: おめでとう ジョーダン

translation.en: So humble, isn't he?
translation.ja: 本当に謙虚な男だな

translation.en: Just wanna slap his face. [chuckles]
translation.ja: ひっぱたいてやりたい

translation.en: I'm kidding. I would never slap a student, not until after they graduate.
translation.ja: 冗談だ　生徒は叩(たた)かない 卒業まではね

translation.en: But he's not going to graduate, so it's fine.
translation.ja: でも彼は卒業しないか

translation.en: Okay.
translation.ja: さてと

translation.en: -Here you go, big guy. So proud. -[chuckles]
translation.ja: これを　大物の君に

translation.en: Enjoy your moment of glory.
translation.ja: 栄光の瞬間を楽しんで

translation.en: [boy] Not my favorite.
translation.ja: あり得ない

translation.en: It's Jordan Van Draanen, baby.
translation.ja: ジョーダン･ヴァン･ドラネンだぜ ベイビー

translation.en: Is that it?
translation.ja: それだけ？

translation.en: Yeah, bro.
translation.ja: ああ

translation.en: Of course, it is.
translation.ja: だろうね

translation.en: No, I just want the microphone.
translation.ja: マイクを返して

translation.en: -Oh, okay. -Yeah. Okay, all right, yes!
translation.ja: よし　続けるぞ

translation.en: Well, that was fun.
translation.ja: いいね

translation.en: Moving right along. Your 2021 Prom Queen,
translation.ja: 次はプロムクイーンの発表だ

translation.en: the woman voted to a forcible dance with the guy behind me.
translation.ja: 後ろの男と踊るハメになるのは…

translation.en: No, no, no, no, no. Keep it on. Keep it all on.
translation.ja: 脱ぐな　全部 着てろ

translation.en: We have all seen plenty of your nipples.
translation.ja: みんな君の乳首は見飽きてる

translation.en: All right, your 2021 Prom Queen,
translation.ja: 2021年度のプロムクイーンは…

translation.en: in the closest vote we've had in a very long time,
translation.ja: 近年まれに見る接戦を制した―

translation.en: Padgett Sawyer.
translation.ja: パジェット･ソーヤー

translation.en: [girl] Yeah, Padgett!
translation.ja: パジェット！

translation.en: Congratulations.
translation.ja: おめでとう

translation.en: -Thank you! -Really beautiful.
translation.ja: とてもキレイだ

translation.en: [boy] That's right, Padge!
translation.ja: いいぞ

translation.en: [Padgett] This is me.
translation.ja: これは私

translation.en: And this is also me.
translation.ja: それから これも私

translation.en: And this is me too.
translation.ja: これもね

translation.en: -Hey. -[audience laughs]
translation.ja: 俺だ

translation.en: But I'm gonna let you guys in on a little secret. It's all fake.
translation.ja: でも これは本当の姿じゃない

translation.en: Because the truth is, this is the real me.
translation.ja: 真実を見せるわ これが本当の私よ

translation.en: [Padgett] And so is this.
translation.ja: これもよ

translation.en: Let's not forget about this one.
translation.ja: これは忘れちゃダメよね

translation.en: Bubble Girl!
translation.ja: チョウチン女子！

translation.en: Yep, that is snot coming out of my nose.
translation.ja: そのとおり　鼻水が出てる

translation.en: But here's the thing.
translation.ja: 真実を話すわ

translation.en: For the last four years, I've been so busy selling myself on social media,
translation.ja: この４年間 ＳＮＳで自分の評価を上げようと―

translation.en: putting out this image of who I wanted people to think I am,
translation.ja: 人々が望む姿を必死で作り上げてきた

translation.en: this perfect person
translation.ja: 完璧な私をね

translation.en: with perfect makeup,
translation.ja: 完璧なメイク

translation.en: perfect clothes,
translation.ja: 完璧な服

translation.en: perfect grades,
translation.ja: 完璧な成績

translation.en: the perfect boyfriend.
translation.ja: そして完璧な彼氏

translation.en: And trust me. Nothing could've been further from the truth.
translation.ja: でも真実からはかけ離れてたわ

translation.en: I even lied about where I live.
translation.ja: 住まいも偽ってた

translation.en: We all do it…
translation.ja: 誰でも 何かを―

translation.en: in our own way
translation.ja: 偽ってるわ

translation.en: like someone special once told me.
translation.ja: ある人にこう言われたの

translation.en: He said high school is just a bunch of scared people
translation.ja: “高校なんて自分を偽ってる―”

translation.en: pretending to be something they're not,
translation.ja: “臆病者の集まりだ”

translation.en: and that can be true.
translation.ja: 本当かもしれない

translation.en: Especially when we're at our worst.
translation.ja: 最悪な時は 特にね

translation.en: But it doesn't have to be that way.
translation.ja: でも 偽る必要はないんだと―

translation.en: That's the lesson he taught me.
translation.ja: 彼から学んだわ

translation.en: I only wish I didn't have to lose him to learn it.
translation.ja: 彼を失わずにそれを学びたかった

translation.en: Are you sure?
translation.ja: 本当に？

translation.en: Second place, coming through, make some room.
translation.ja: 繰り上がりね

translation.en: Second place, I'll take it. I mean, if she doesn't want it, I'll take it.
translation.ja: ２位だから 私がもらう彼女が要らないなら

translation.en: Excuse me, Ms. Pierce, you… you actually came in fourth.
translation.ja: 待ってくれすまないが 君は… ４位だった

translation.en: No, I demand a recount.
translation.ja: まさか　再集計を

translation.en: No need. You actually lost by a lot.
translation.ja: 必要ない　大差で負けた

translation.en: Please leave the stage.
translation.ja: ステージを下りて

translation.en: -[boy 3] Burn! -Thank you. All right!
translation.ja: どうも 繰り上がりでクイーンに選ばれたのは―

translation.en: So the runner-up and your 2021 Prom Queen
translation.ja: 繰り上がりでクイーンに選ばれたのは―

translation.en: is a write-in candidate.
translation.ja: 候補者以外の人物だ

translation.en: Her name is Celeste Straczynski.
translation.ja: セレステ･ストラジンスキー

translation.en: Is there a Celeste Straczynski here?
translation.ja: セレステ･ストラジンスキーはいる？

translation.en: [softly] Your hat.
translation.ja: 帽子を

translation.en: -[clears throat] -All right, let's do this.
translation.ja: さあ それじゃあ…

translation.en: -Ow! -Suck it!
translation.ja: 痛え！ クソ食らえ！

translation.en: DJ, hit it!
translation.ja: ＤＪ 音楽を

translation.en: -[Quinn] Padgett. -All right.
translation.ja: パジェット

translation.en: I'm gonna take off.
translation.ja: じゃあ 行くわ

translation.en: Wait, your phone.
translation.ja: 待って　携帯を

translation.en: -Where are you going? -[Padgett] Home.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 家に帰る

translation.en: Come on, stay with us. -I officially forgive you. -[Padgett chuckles]
translation.ja: いいじゃん　残りなよ正式に許したから

translation.en: No, I'm done here,
translation.ja: やり遂げたから帰るわ

translation.en: but you guys have fun, though.
translation.ja: あなたたちは楽しんで

translation.en: Well,
translation.ja: 私はまだいる

translation.en: I'm still here, and why do I know this song?
translation.ja: 私はまだいる なぜか この曲知ってるわ

translation.en: -[text pings] -♪ Beside the green, green grass ♪
translation.ja: 〝君のスピーチ感動したよ〞

translation.en: ♪ Swing, swing ♪
translation.ja: 〝配信を見てたの？〞

translation.en: ♪ Swing the spinning step ♪
translation.ja: 〝まさか俺の携帯は骨董品だ〞

translation.en: Whoa.
translation.ja: よし

translation.en: Hey.
translation.ja: やあ

translation.en: Cameron. I… How…
translation.ja: キャメロン どうやって…

translation.en: I may have had a little help.
translation.ja: 少し助けを借りたかも

translation.en: I would've rode him all the way, but I would've gotten arrested on the 405.
translation.ja: マジで馬で来てたら途中で逮捕されてる

translation.en: I meant what I said. I'm gonna start being honest about who I am from now on,
translation.ja: スピーチは本心よ今からは自分を偽らない

translation.en: I swear.
translation.ja: 約束するわ

translation.en: Okay, well, if we're being honest, there is one thing in your speech you got wrong.
translation.ja: 正直に言うと君は１つだけ間違ってる

translation.en: What was it?
translation.ja: 何？

translation.en: You never really lost me.
translation.ja: 君は俺を失ってない

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.ja: マジで？

translation.en: -I'm done with her. -Thank you.
translation.ja: もう いい ありがとう

translation.en: Now where were we?
translation.ja: 何してたんだっけ？

translation.en: [Brin] Yes! Whoo-hoo! Finally!
translation.ja: やった！　やっとだわ！

translation.en: [boy] Check it out!
translation.ja: おい 見ろよ

translation.en: [Padgett] Good morning, guys. Guess where we are?
translation.ja: おはよう今 どこだと思う？

translation.en: Portugal! [chuckles]
translation.ja: ポルトガルよ

translation.en: Hard to believe we're already six days into our trip.
translation.ja: 私たちの旅も 何と６日目

translation.en: Say hi, Cameron.
translation.ja: さあ キャメロン

translation.en: I just wanna say thank you to all my followers who came back to me, who are so supportive of my new direction here.
translation.ja: 新しい私を支持してくれてありがとう

translation.en: I hope you guys keep following us this summer because Cameron has promised
translation.ja: 楽しみにしてて キャメロンが写真撮影を手伝ってくれる約束なの

translation.en: to help me post photos every day along the way.
translation.ja: キャメロンが写真撮影を手伝ってくれる約束なの

translation.en: So stay safe, be yourself,
translation.ja: みんなも自分らしくね

translation.en: and I'll see you guys soon.
translation.ja: またすぐに会いましょう

translation.en: ♪ Lift your open hand ♪
translation.ja: “＃エッフェル塔” 〝＃リスボン〞

translation.en: ♪ Strike up the band And make the fireflies dance ♪
translation.ja: 〝＃リスボン〞 〝＃ベネチア〞

translation.en: ♪ Silver moon's sparkling ♪
translation.ja: 〝＃アムステルダムでタトゥー〞

translation.en: -All right, Alden. -[buzzing] Never say I'm someone who welches on a bet.
translation.ja: 見て オールデン約束はちゃんと守るわ

translation.en: ♪ So kiss me ♪
translation.ja: 〝＃賭けに負けた〞

translation.en: [Padgett laughs] Sorry.
translation.ja: ごめん

translation.en: -…sister again. -Hm.
translation.ja: 妹に触れたら…

translation.en: Goddamnit, I flinched.
translation.ja: ヤバい　ビビった

translation.en: Get it!
translation.ja: いいぞ！

translation.en: Working. It's working great.
translation.ja: いい感じだ

translation.en: Well, I'm still here, and I'm gonna say that again.
translation.ja: 私は まだいる それから やり直し

translation.en: I mean, aren't you captain of the--
translation.ja: ダンスチームの…
